summary: Diff adds a new FinanceGuidesPage component, introduces a ROUTES.FINANCE_GUIDES constant, appends a Finance Guides nav item, and adds /finance-guides to sitemap.xml. However, the diff summary does not provide enough visible evidence to confirm the requested non-homepage (static-page) SEO behavior is applied for /finance-guides, and it includes changes to ancillary project tracking/summary files not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply non-homepage SEO behavior for the Finance Guides route consistent with other non-tool static pages (i.e., do not apply tool SEO; do not modify homepage SEO).
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx is truncated and does not show the actual SEO branching logic for the new /finance-guides route; while SEO utilities are imported, the diff excerpt does not confirm that /finance-guides uses the same default/static-page SEO behavior as other non-tool pages (e.g., About/Contact) and not tool SEO.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking/state metadata unrelated to creating the /finance-guides page, adding it to navigation, SEO behavior, or sitemap updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for updating internal project state/summary files; these changes are outside the required implementation surface.
